item.description: Hi, good to meet many of you in the last meeting at Starbucks - I am hosting a big (30+ ppl) viewing party on Sun for the Pat / Giants Game this coming Sun / most of us are transplants to Boston, great opp for everyone who is new to this country / city to exchange ideas, learn about the sports and / or networking, please show up on time as seats will be going fast

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Superbowl celebration - An American Tradition
